class_notes: (Prior completion of Psyc 110) ("Coverage of all major adult psychological disorders in terms of their etiology, diagnosis, and treatment. Particular emphasis will be placed on: (1) exposing students to the major theoretical and conceptual models of abnormal behavior, and (2) providing students with the skills to become more critical consumers of the burgeoning literature on psychopathology.
course_description: Descriptions of, explanations for, and treatment of the major adult psychological disorders.
schedule_location: TTh 1pm-2:15pm in New Psyc Bldg 290 (36 Eagle Ro
